column3: I added this to allow showing the Debug window without the need to have the client window open.\n
@laanwj If you don't want to be the console that public just comment. I still like that :).\n

Well yeah I guess it's ok for "experimental software" :-)

And yes some icon for the debug window would be nice, but I'm not really a drawing talent either, and finding suitably licensed stock icons is very hard (most is CC, Freeware or LGPL).
